ValidationRule.description: For 'Permit No.' that starts with other irrelevant characters
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "II")) , NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "IG")) , NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "IN")) , NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "OD")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "OO")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "DP")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "IM")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "OU")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "OT")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "IE")), NOT(BEGINS( Permit_No__c , "RM")) )
